meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be acted upon or influenced.
meanings.sent1: Her actabilities were evident when she easily followed the instructions.
meanings.sent2: The actabilities of the material made it perfect for molding into different shapes.
meanings.sent3: The actabilities of the puppy were put to the test when it encountered a squirrel.
meanings.sent4: His actabilities shone through when he gracefully handled the unexpected situation.
meanings.sent5: The actabilities of the magnet were so strong that it attracted all the paper clips.

meanings.definition: The capacity or potential for being acted upon or influenced.
meanings.sent1: The actabilities of the plant were evident as it thrived in different environments.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the actabilities of the market helped in making strategic decisions.
meanings.sent3: The actabilities of the car surprised everyone when it started without a key.
meanings.sent4: Her actabilities in leadership were recognized when she guided the team to success.
meanings.sent5: The actabilities of the cloud were so vast that it could hold immense amounts of data.
